text: The 2011 Swiss Open Grand Prix Gold was a badminton tournament which took place at the St. Jakobshalle in Basel, Switzerland on 15–20 March 2011 and had a total purse of $125,000. This is the 49th edition of the Swiss Open tournament, rated as a Grand Prix Gold event, where before in 2007–2010 was part of the highest grade tournament BWF Superseries. ==Men's singles== ===Seeds=== # Jan Ø. Jørgensen (Quarterfinals) # Simon Santoso (Semifinals) # Rajiv Ouseph (Withdrew) # Park Sung-hwan (Champion) # Son Wan-ho (Third Round) # Parupalli Kashyap (First Round) # Dionysius Hayom Rumbaka (Withdrew) #
